LanguageData.CAN_InsectPemmican.label: insect pemmican
LanguageData.CAN_InsectPemmican.description: A preserved mashed mixture of insect fat and plant food. Tastes bland, but not offensive. It lasts a very long time without refrigeration.
LanguageData.CAN_InsectMealSurvivalPack.label: packaged survival insect meal
LanguageData.CAN_InsectMealSurvivalPack.description: A high-quality insect packaged meal, manufactured for use in survival situations.
LanguageData.CAN_InsectMealSimple.label: simple insect meal
LanguageData.CAN_InsectMealSimple.description: A simple meal quickly cooked from insect meat and a few ingredients.
LanguageData.CAN_InsectMealFine.label: fine insect meal
LanguageData.CAN_InsectMealFine.description: A complex dish assembled with care from insect meat and a wide selection of ingredients.
LanguageData.CAN_InsectMealLavish.label: lavish insect meal
LanguageData.CAN_InsectMealLavish.description: A masterpiece of the insect culinary arts, this meal nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
